metadata.dc:author: Triskier, Fabián J
metadata.dc:description: The article summarizes a number of recent findings about the brain changes which take place during the adolescence and the youth, their relations with their behavior and some questions are formulated with regard to the deepening of these hypothesis.
metadata.dc:title: La era de los axolots. Algunas especulaciones respecto a las modificaciones neurobiológicas durante la adolescencia.
[The era of the axolotls: speculations regarding the neurobiological modifications during the adolescence].
